scripts.start:prod: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./config/hapi&&  set NODE_ENV=production&&  node server.js
scripts.start: npm run build  &&  npm run start:prod
scripts.start:dev:hapi: rm -rf ./node_modules/hapi-artists-api  &&  npm install  &&  set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./config/hapi&&  set NODE_ENV=development&&  node server.js
scripts.start:dev:hapi:debug: rm -rf ./node_modules/hapi-artists-api  &&  npm install  &&  set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./config/hapi&&  set NODE_ENV=development&&  node debug server.js
scripts.start:dev:watch: (start webpack --progress --env=development --watch) && (set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./config/hapi&& set NODE_ENV=development&&  node server.js)
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && (set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./config/hapi&& set NODE_ENV=development&&  start node server.js) && (start webpack-dev-server --env=development)
scripts.start:dev:unix: npm run build:dev && NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./config/hapi  NODE_ENV=development  node server.js&  webpack-dev-server --env=development
scripts.lint: eslint server.js webpack.config.js config/hapi/*.js config/webpack/*.js server/src/**/*.js webapp/src/__tests__/*.spec.js --quiet --fix
